content: If checked, all new users will receive a invite letter with authorization details.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining that an invite letter will be sent to new users who have this option checked. It appears in a Help Button within the Import Complete Step page, providing context for users interacting with this feature.

usage.context:
<HelpButton
 place="right"
 offsetRight={0}
 style={{ margin: "0px 5px" }}
 tooltipContent={
 <Text fontSize="12px">{t("Settings:InviteLetterTooltip")}</Text>
 }
 dataTestId="invite_letter_help_button"
 />
 </Wrapper>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تفاصيل التفويض' for 'authorization details' is not the most natural or precise rendering in Arabic. 'تفويض' implies authorization, but a more common and clear term would be 'بيانات التفويض' or 'تفاصيل صلاحية'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إذا تم التحقق منها، فسيتلقى جميع المستخدمين الجدد خطاب دعوة مع بيانات التفويض.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'avtorizasiya təfərrüatları' for 'authorization details' is technically correct, but a more natural phrasing would be 'təsdiq məlumatları' or 'giriş məlumatları'. 'Avtorizasiya' is a more formal term and might not be the most user-friendly choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşarələndikdə bütün yeni istifadəçilər təsdiq məlumatları olan dəvət məktubu alacaqlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ако е отметнато, всички нови потребители ще получат писмо с покана с подробности за оторизация.' is a literal translation and slightly awkward in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Ако е активирано, всички нови потребители ще получат покана с информация за достъп.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако е активирано, всички нови потребители ще получат покана с информация за достъп.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'покана' (invitation) could be better separated by a comma or dash for readability. The current phrasing feels a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако е активирано, всички нови потребители ще получат покана – с информация за достъп.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'invite letter' is translated as 'հրավեր նամակ'. While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used term in Armenian for an invitation letter in a digital context might be 'միացման հրավերդարձ' or simply 'հրավերդարձ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'invite letter' as 'միացման հրավերդարձ' or 'հրավերդարձ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'authorization details' is not accurately conveyed by '인증 정보'. '인증 정보' implies authentication information, whereas 'authorization details' refers to the specific permissions and access granted by the invite. A more accurate translation might be something like '승인 정보' or '권한 정보'.
The phrase "ຖ້າກວດແລ້ວ" (if checked) doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of "If checked." A more accurate translation would be something like "ຖ້າເລືອກເອົາ" (if selected) or "ຖ້າຕັ້ງໃຈໄວ້" (if set).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າເລືອກເອົາ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word “ອະນຸຍາດ” (authorization) is technically correct but might be overly formal or technical for this context. Depending on the target audience, a more accessible term might be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າເລືອກເອົາ, ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທຸກຄົນຈະໄດ້ຮັບຈົດໝຶນເຊີນທີ່ມີຂໍ້ມູນການເຂົ້າໃຊ້ງານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "authorization details" is inaccurate. "Szczegóły procesu uwierzytelniania" translates to "details of the authentication process" which is not the same as "authorization details". The original English implies details necessary for granting access or permission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli opcja jest zaznaczona, wszyscy nowi użytkownicy otrzymają zaproszenie ze szczegółami autoryzacji.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing "Jeśli opcja jest zaznaczona" is slightly awkward. It implies that a checkbox or other UI element is being referred to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli zaznaczysz tę opcję, wszyscy nowi użytkownicy otrzymają zaproszenie ze szczegółami autoryzacji.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization details" is not accurately reflected in the Sinhala translation. "අවසර දීමේ විස්තර" (awasadaimē vistharama) literally translates to 'authorization details,' which isn't the best way to convey the meaning of invite letter details. It should be more along the lines of 'invitation details' or 'information related to the invitation'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to something like: "සබල කළහොත්, සියලුම නව පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට පිළිගැනීමේ ලිපියේ ඇති තොරතුරු ලැබෙනු ඇත." (Sabala kalāhotha, siyallum nawa parīśrīlakayin ta piliganeemi lipiyē ati thoraturu labēnu athā.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a slightly formal tone which may not align with the original English tooltip.  The use of 'අති' (ati) is overly formal for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a slightly less formal wording, but this depends on the overall tone of the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authorization details' is not accurately translated. 'Autorizacija' refers to the authorization process, not the details associated with it. A more accurate translation would convey what details are being provided.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ako je označeno, svi novi korisnici će dobiti pozivno pismo sa detaljima o pristupu/priključivanju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization details" is a bit too literal and formal for a user-facing tooltip. It doesn't flow naturally in Turkish. "Yetkilendirme ayrıntıları" is technically correct but can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşaretlenirse, tüm yeni kullanıcılar davetiyelerinde erişim bilgileriyle birlikte bir mektup alır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure is a little clunky.  Consider reordering for better readability in Turkish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşaretlenirse, tüm yeni kullanıcılar erişim bilgileri içeren bir davet mektubu alırlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Invite Letter” is not accurately translated. “Chào mừng” (welcome) doesn't convey the meaning of an invitation letter.
“Việc ủy quyền” is an awkward phrasing. It's better to convey the meaning of authorization details more naturally.
